item.title: Lock this plz
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“smfftw224, post:11, topic:221982”][quote author=bigh51 link=topic=291524.msg2350228#msg2350228 date=1216922142]
there is no such thing as taking credits for a compiler. you cant take credits for it, sun made the only one. batch code isnt a compiler, the compiler itsself is a compiler. none of you made it, the people who made java, sun did. so stfu about credits and leeching compilers. ITS JUST USING BATCH CODE TO USE SUNS JAVA COMPILER. IDIOTS.
[/quote]

Then tell me how and where I go to get the compiler I need.[/quote]your an idiot…

@echo off title Compiler V2.0 echo Best Compiler Alive echo Compiling... if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit will work. the reason you got 100 errors is because you fucked something up because you must suck at coding or not know how to. the compiler itsself works, its just you fucked something up. its not the compilers fault you cant code something without getting 100 errors, and also this is in the wrong section so GTFO.

Read full topic

item.title: Lock this plz

item.description:
@Vrunk wrote:

First off, if you guys were writing your own compilers, you would not need our help.

You are writing unnecessary batch scripts.

Ant was made so that batch scripts would not have to be written (or if they are written, they would be 1-2 liners)

item.title: Lock this plz
item.dc:creator: @smfftw224 smfftw224
item.description:
@smfftw224 wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:2, topic:221982”]are you a fucking idiot? this is in the wrong section and there is no such thing as leeching a compiler. all a fucking compiler does is compile java files to class files. the command line java compiler was made by sun as was java. batch code is just batch code, not the compiler itsself so nobody can take credits for it.
now. all you need for a compiler if you have the environmental variables correct is:

@echo off javac *.java [/quote]
:eek: :eek: :eek: wow, first of all, whats with all the swearing…second yes there is a such thing as a leeched compiler. (Example-Taking iran4life compiler and putting your name on it…), If i worded it wrong please feel free to correct me but honestly…is all the swearing necessary? third of all…my enviromental variables are perfect but I always get a ‘javac’ isnt recognized as an internal or external source…so if you can stop swearing long enough to give me proper instructions(as well as what section it goes in) I would be very appriciative.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2008, 07:25:12 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Owner Crackwall, post:3, topic:221982”]Ok…So I Came Here To Release A Ownage Compiler:

@echo off title Compiler V2.0 echo Best Compiler Alive echo Compiling... if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Download Link:

http://uppit.com/PL8MB4

WARNING: THIS WAS POSTED ON ANOTHER WEBSITE AND I DECIDED TO POST IT HERE,TO SHARE IT WITH YOU GUYS.[/quote]

“With your compiler I get the same 100 errors found
Finished!” message.

Read full topic
